Ahmed Rezine

  • Home
  • Research
  • Teaching

Associate professor ("docent") at Linköping University. I look for ways to extend automated verification techniques. Interests:

  • model checking, abstract interpretation
  • parameterized verification: concurrent, distributed systems
  • concurrent and heap manipulating data structures: fine grained, lock free
  • cache coherence protocols and memory consistency
  • timing side-channel attacks

News

  • Accepted conference paper. On reachability in parameterized phaser programs at Tools and Algorithms for the Construction and Analysis of Systems. TACAS 2019.

  • Accepted journal article. Quantifying the Information Leakage in Cache Attacks via Symbolic Execution at ACM Transactions on Embedded Computing Systems (TECS) 2019.

  • Accepted journal article. Software-based Self-Testing using Bounded Model Checking for Out-of-Order Superscalar Processors at IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems, 2019.

  • I co-investigate, with Prof.Sudipta Chattopadhyay, the Verification and Validation of Side-channel Freedom project. The project members are grateful for the generous support of a highly competitive three-years grant from the Singapore Ministry of Education (MOE).

  • We are looking for two post-docs for the Verification and Validation of Side-channel Freedom project project. The selected candidates will work from the Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD).

  • Our new work "On Reachability in Parameterized Phaser Programs", can be found here https://arxiv.org/pdf/1811.07142.pdf.

  • Accepted conference paper. TRAU: SMT solver for string constraints, at the International Conference on Formal Methods in Computer-Aided Design, FMCAD 18.

  • Accepted conference paper. Stability-aware integrated routing and scheduling for control applications in Ethernet networks, at Design, Automation and Test in Europe, DATE 2018.

  • Accepted journal article. An Integrated Specification and Verification Technique for Highly Concurrent Data Structures at the International Journal on Software Tools and Technology Transfer, volume 19, STTT 2017.

  • Accepted conference paper. Safety Verification of Phaser Programs, at the International Conference on Formal Methods in Computer-Aided Design, FMCAD 17.

  • Accepted conference paper. Quantifying the Information Leak in Cache Attacks via Symbolic Execution, at the 15th ACM-IEEE International Conference on Formal Methods and Models for System Design, MEMOCODE 17.

  • Accepted conference paper. Flatten and Conquer (A Framework for Efficient Analysis of String Constraints), at the 38th annual ACM SIGPLAN conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation, PLDI 17.

  • Accepted journal article. Counting dynamically synchronizing processes in International Journal on Software Tools for Technology Transfer, volume 18, STTT 16.
